title: OPL Live from a Sydney Bar!
body:
Hey Guys
Just letting you guys know that Spawn Point Small bar will be hosting an event to watch all the Oceanic teams play live next week!
We are based in Sydney CBD and have room for approx 60 League loving fans!
Unfortunately we are an 18+ Venue so sorry for all the youngsters.
We are on Clarence Street in Sydney but look up Spawn Point Small Bar for more information on the event!

Hope to see you guys there
Kirby

replies.body: Is this Kirby of 3plusplus.net by chance, or another Kirby based in Sydney?
Another Kirby, Apparently there's more of us out there then i thought :P

Kirby I am referencing runs www.3plusplus.net a warhammer 40,000 centric competitive gaming blog that has been around for several years and has had 30-50,000 (probably more, I didn't bother reading the last stats update this year) individual IP hits a month, which is pretty impressive for tabletop miniatures gaming. he also authors on the more general and larger viewer based www.belloflostsouls.blogspot.com Oh and he lives in Sydney. So yeah, curious was all.
If I wasn't in Melb I would come down and sink some beers and watch some games.
